aboutText:
My name is Artem Hazmetow
I'm a Frontend Developer
like:
Passionate about UI, animation, 
and performance.
command: Effectively collaborate with the team, including developers, designers, and managers.
deadlines: Always meet deadlines and take responsibility for the quality of my work.
clearCode: Write clean, understandable, and maintainable code, following the project style.
godThoughts: Clearly and accurately express my thoughts, quickly formulate questions and suggestions.
details: Thoroughly understand requirements and pay close attention to the technical details.
calm: Accept constructive criticism calmly and use it for professional growth.
workTime: Effectively manage my work time and maintain priorities.
disagreements: Resolve work disagreements without conflict and maintain a healthy team environment.
help: Support junior specialists, share knowledge, and assist in their learning.
studyingTech: Continuously learn new technologies and approaches to grow as a professional.
abomExperience: I worked in a team with a senior developer on an internal web application for managing company employees.
freelanceExperience: Worked on SPA applications: admin panels, online stores, landing pages.
askMe: Do you feel like asking me something interesting?Iâ€™m here and ready to chat.
writeMe: Write to me and I will try to respond at any time convenient for you.
